content.text: Match ends, BATE Borisov 0, Barcelona 5.

Goal!  BATE Borisov 0, Barcelona 5. David Villa (Barcelona) right footed shot from the left side of the box to the centre of the goal. Assisted by Thiago Alcántara with a through ball.
Offside, Barcelona. Cesc Fàbregas tries a through ball, but David Villa is caught offside.
Lionel Messi (Barcelona) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
